GameEventAction.Description:
Our newly formed Republic will stand the test of time having recently completed:
Planetary Administration
We have also made great strides towards:
Diplomatic Focus
Our homeworld will become a beacon for peace and prosperity with our newly finished Planetary Administration Center, where we shall hold our grand assemblies, work out our differences, and forge a lasting peace.

Our thriving democracy stands on the precipice of a new eara of space exploration and tourism, with:
Basic Recreation Systems Basic Space Commerce Basic Transport Systems Civilian Transports

Your vassals stand ready to serve your glorious reign, having recently completed:
Fighter Bays Zero-G Combat Assault Pods
In addition, the first army awaits your command on the homeworld.

Our Captains of Industry await your order to open a new era of prosperty and wealth, having recently compelted:
Basic Space Commerce Enhanced Commerce Center
Our homeworld thrums with the sound of commerce, awaiting your bold expansion plans.

My Liege, we have recently completed:
Stellar Frigates Specialized Escorts Mechs
A pair of Imperial Mechs stands ready on our homeworld.

Sire, I am proud to announce the recent completion of:
Coordinated Command Crew Systems Royal Palace
Your elite royal guard stands at sharp attention along the halls of your newly completed Royal Palace, on this most auspicious day, the day of your coronation.
Millions of your subjects look on from the courtyard below and are tuned in to state media in every corner of your empire to get a glimpse of their new sovereign, and wonder, what comes next?

Your initial directive as head researcher and first amongst equals has paid off with the completion of:
Exploration Scanners Planetary Exploration Long Range Sensors
Another scientist nearly your equal has emerged to head up our day to day operations now that you have accepted your appointment as head of the government. Worry not that we will execute your directions with all professional alacrity as befits your example and legacy as chief scientist of this illustrious instituion. I eagerly await your further instructions to unlock the secrets of the stars to spread our kind over the whole of the cosmos!

The hive is ready to serve! We have completed some important breakthroughs in:
Improved Logistics Assault Pods Basic Transport Systems Military Transports Stellar Frigates
Our first army awaits your command at our homeworld...
